review:
Dr. Naveen Chandra took the time to thoroughly explain my condition and the treatment options available. Their approach was not only knowledgeable but also compassionate, making sure I felt comfortable and informed every step of the way. The thoroughness of the examination and the personalized attention made a significant difference in my experience.

I am grateful for the excellent care I received and would highly recommend Dr. Naveen Chandra to anyone in need of a top-notch cardiologist. The entire experience was outstanding and I feel confident in the care I am receiving moving forward.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited Dr.Naveen Chandra for my 76 year old mother on Dec 2019 when she had difficulty walking even a few steps. She was 100kgs and there was edema in both legs. The doctor did an Echo and diagnosed severe PASP along with other age related heart problems and immediately put her on higher dose of diuretics. He did not rush us into admission. Although we were a new patient, the doctor was reachable on phone for clarification and on whatsapp thereafter to keep a close tab on blood work to adjust dosages. Today, my mother has shed all that excess fluid and is on a steady dose of medicines. Her quality of life has improved, thanks to Dr.Naveen Chandra.

I very strongly recommend Dr Naveen Chandra. His calming demenaour immediately put my mother at ease. He genuinely listened to everything that my mother had to say and did not belittle any of her complaints. While  the doctor kept it real to me and my brother about my mother’s condition, that she cannot take in surgical interventions, he did not give up on her. He reassured my mother that she will get better with medicines. 

My mother had twice been hospitalized in a prominent hospital and all I remember is doctors would often go ‘she has too many problems’, and a sympathetic hollow gaze. We felt very helpless. Contrast this to meeting Dr. Naveen who was reassuring with the patient, realistic with us and spot-on with the treatment as the results show. 
Hats off to such compassionate and equally competent doctors in these times.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Naveen Chandra is very ************* skillfull and down to earth doctor

I visited doctor for my dad’s coronary angioplasty surgery in 2021 and he gave the right guidance about the situation and correct treatment with coronary angioplasty

Post that we were in regular follow up with the doctor over more than two years now and my dad is completely fit and fine with the medication and guidance suggested by doctor 

The best of doctor is he is very down to earth person and even provide guidance on phone based upon his availability… Telephonic guidance its a need of an hour as it saves a-lot of time of working professionals and I guess a very few doctors provide such support 

Even when we visit clinics for follow up he is always on his toes helping the patient around…  Based upon past experiences usually doctors are sitting in his cabin and giving treatments to patient and usually patient is mobilised around for lab test, ecg test, echo and many other test during which ultimately patient suffers lot but with Dr Naveen Chandra many times I have observed he himself collect reports or perform echo or blood pressure check so that patients are not much suffered which I personally feel is very great and helpful gesture from doctor

Overall I bless to have Dr. Naveen Chandra because of him my dad is living healthy life now
Diagnosis and explanation of the issue is great.He  is friendly and always there for the patient and family.His  team is extremely professional , dedicated and has a personalized approach

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This was about a year back, my father started complaining of severe chest pain while walking. Someone from our apartment had suggested Dr Naveen Chandra, so we went to consult him. He suggested for angiogram and after the angiogram he explained to us the situation of my father. My father had major blockages in all the arteries and only option was bypass with endarterectomy. With extreme patience and empathy he addressed our concerns and explained risks involved. We couldn't decide immediately to go for surgery because of all the risks. My father had to go through lot of other health complications due to this. Finally we went for bypass surgery a couple of months back and my father is doing fine now. Throughout the struggle Dr Naveen Chandra stood with us, he would respond to the messages and calls and suggest right medications and always was there to guide us and help us. He is a very competent and empathetic doctor. Really thank him for all the support he had given us medically and for the guidance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My Father and  I had experienced and continue to have a wonderful experience with DR Naveen Chandra maybe for the last 3-4 years @ Manipal Hospital(erstwhile Columbia Asia Varthur Road )  
Dr Naveens High level of competency, diagnostics, compassion , his eye for details and his High Medical standards have immensely helped my father in helping to lead a better quality of life in spite of his deteriorating heart condition.
Dr. Naveen’s efforts in diagnosing the problem and treatment is second to none to the best of my past experience with other Doctors .

As a Son I trust Dr Chandra 100% wholeheartedly for taking such good medical care of my father ( aged-75) and would highly recommend him to everyone who is looking for a highly competent/Compassionate cardiologist in Bangalore. 

I sincerely thank Manipal Hospital(erstwhile Columbia Asia )  for having such great doctors like Dr Naveen in their elite panel .My never ending trust and belief  continue to live because of such great doctors .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Naveen Chandra is himself a brand that it becomes needless to explain our experience. However, for greater good of the public it's important that we share our experience. 
My father had an acute myocardial infarction few days back which we were not aware about. The day I met him after few days I noticed he had breathing issues. When we rushed him to Columbia hospital doctors informed us of his condition and that they cannot assure us anything. 
Thanks to Dr. Naveen's expertise that my father recovered so fast. Most of the expert doctors were of the opinion that open heart surgery is the only go for my father. But Dr. Naveen turned this major surgery down, he handled the situation with angioplasty and this gave my father a speedy recovery and a normal life now. Through the entire period he was so comforting with us. His humbleness, kind attitude, empathy and hard work has made us indebted to him forever. 
No matter how late it is in night, any issue Dr. Naveen is available at the next available moment making us aware of the condition and the next step. I cannot expect more. Even now when we meet him for regular check up, he meet us in the same way. Any emergency no matter what time it is on the clock he replies our call, messages. Always reachable. 
We are fortunate to have a doctor like him. We wish him all success and good fortune in his life.

Dr. Naveen Chandra took the time to thoroughly explain my condition and the treatment options available. Their approach was not only knowledgeable but also compassionate, making sure I felt comfortable and informed every step of the way. The thoroughness of the examination and the personalized attention made a significant difference in my experience.

I am grateful for the excellent care I received and would highly recommend Dr. Naveen Chandra to anyone in need of a top-notch cardiologist. The entire experience was outstanding and I feel confident in the care I am receiving moving forward.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
My father had pain in the shoulder for more than one day. We took him to the hospital and met a general physician. The general physician inquired my father and adviced us to take ECG which revealed abnormality in heart functioning. She immediately called Dr. Naveen to look into the condition.

Dr. Naveen immediately started the treatment and immediately arranged for angiogram. I told doctor to take into consideration that my father has high serum creatinine level. After looking at the history, he told me that usage of dye for angio should be as minimal as possible for patients with kidney disease, otherwise it will be a big overload on kidneys and would cause kidney failure. Once the angiogram had been completed, he explained that there were two blocks. One was 100% and the other one 80%. He mentioned that 100% block should be removed first and the other one can be treated later. He also explained the severity of the block showing how the block is stopping the main blood flow and how other arteries are compensating the blood flow in the cath lab. He recommended us to go for an immediate angioplasty, as there is no other option. 

Once we gave him our go ahead, he performed angioplasty and it required one stenting also. The whole procedure took around 45 minutes and it was successful. After the procedure, he showed me how the blood became normal after angioplasty and stenting.

We have been following up with doctor after the procedure and very recently we have done the second angioplasty&stenting for my father to remove the second block and he has been doing well.

One thing I want to highlight is that the doctor is available on whatsapp and phone call and provides advice and guidance in case of any queries anytime. He has responded to all my queries till date. Once my father was hospitalized in a different city, I called up the doctor, explained the symptoms and shared reports. He had gone through all the reports and provided directions and advices. That was really helpful in managing the situation. 

I highly recommend Dr. Naveen for consultation related to heart diseases. He is very friendly, explains the issues clearly and approachable. ***** ** ** ******** ********** * ***** *** ** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** *** ** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Naveen sir is the best Interventional Cardiologist by profession and best human by nature. His approach in diagnosing the reported health issue and providing required treatment is much appreciated.
Treats the patient like a family and guides the family members like an elder brother.
My mom is 69 yrs old and has been consulting him since June 2022. His best diagnosis skills and experience saved my mother from fatal situations. My mom and our whole family sincerely thank him for his expert medical services.
He is an asset to the Hospital/Organisation and all his patients.
Dr Naveen Sir- Wish you long life and loads of success in all your future endeavours 🙏
Once again - we are obliged to your continuous guidance given and treatment provided to our mom.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Since 2016, we have been seeing Dr. Naveen Chandra. After a heart attack, my mother had a stent placed in Columbia Asia. My mom experienced a few health issues for about a whole year. Dr. Naveen Chandra was giving the appropriate drugs and a few other necessary tests as soon as we met him. In Interventional cardiology, he is best.
He refuses to prescribe unnecessary tests or medications that is his best quality. An extremely grounded individual who never fails to smile. After moving to Chennai, my mother struggled to adjust to her new physician. Thus, she returned to Bangalore Aster (Whitefield), where Dr. Naveen Chandra currently practices. Generally upbeat individual who is undoubtedly well-liked by many patients because of his professionalism and modesty.
Always answer's our call or on whatsapp.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My mother underwent a pacemaker implantation procedure performed by Dr. Naveen Chandra. I find it difficult to adequately express my profound gratitude to the doctor. *** ****** ** *********** *** ** *** ****** ******* ** ********** *** he exemplifies an exceptional human being.

At the age of 79, my mother and I made the journey from Gurgaon to Bangalore specifically for this procedure, solely because we held unwavering trust in Dr. Naveen's expertise, and rightfully so. Despite his demanding schedule, Dr. Naveen made himself available by phone to address our concerns.

I am truly at a loss for words to sufficiently commend this remarkable doctor, who not only excels in his medical profession but also displays remarkable qualities as a compassionate human being.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Irregular Heartbeat,Heart Attack,Pain in Left part of Chest,Blocked Blood Vessels,
review: The best Cardiologist cum human beingWent for checkup of mother's heartache,Apparently it turned out to be a heart attack, that too a massive one.Dr Naveen, without wasting any time, immediately prepped for surgery after explaining the situation to me.Within few hours, my mother was out of danger, thanks to his gifted hands and knowledge.On top of that he also reduced some of the charges, as at that time there was no insurance cover.Dr Naveen chandra is not only a good cardiologist but also a very good human being with a kind heart...He doesn't just connects professionally rather at human level too.He responded to several of my calls, messages despite being busy and also at odd hours Truly recommended for - Expert knowledge on his subjectGifted surgical expertiseBiological Know-howPositive attitudeAvailability, easily approachable Professional and personal conduct10/10 on all the aforementioned points

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Naveen Chandra is fresh in my memory for his kind gesture. 
Apart from being excellent at his work, he is very down to earth and connecting. 
****** ******* *** *** ******* *** ***** ******** **** ** ******* Dr. Naveen is very human and I still remember the way he gave me positive hopes and built my confidence of nothing going wrong with my husband was just great.
And like he promised, he brought my husband safe and sound out of the OT... 
He is too good at his work, **** ************* *** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Coronary Angioplasty / Bypass Surgery,Minimally Invasive Cardiac Surgery,
review:
I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt thanks for the excellent care and expertise Dr. Naveen provided to my dad during his angioplasty procedure. His skill and attention to detail were instrumental in ensuring that the procedure went smoothly, and my family and I are extremely grateful for your efforts.

I also wanted to thank for recommending that we meet with Dr. Sudarshan for a MIDCABG procedure instead of a normal Bypass which will help my dad recover faster . We were very pleased with the outcome. Your advice and guidance were invaluable, and we are fortunate to have had Dr. Naveen as our doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I met Dr Naveen to show my father who had 99% blockage in Left Main Artery. He checked thoroughly and explained us the possibility of a Bypass Vs Angioplasty looking into the seriousness of the blockage and my father’s age. My dad finally underwent a successful angioplasty within 2 hrs which was done by Dr Naveen. My dad is doing well now and all thanks to Dr Naveen. He is empathetic, friendly and extremely approachable. Makes the patient and family feel very comfortable. He is both a great cardiologist and also a great human being. Don't think twice before going to him for any cardiology problem. You will be in safe hands.
Deepan Lodha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Carotid Angioplasty And Stenting,Coronary Angiogram,Hypertension Treatment,Cardiography,Cardiac Diseases,
review:
We visited Dr. Naveen Chandra to treat my 64 yo father's breathlessness and a possible cardiac arrest in Emergency ward. 
Doctor treated him with the right medication as well as took very good care of him in the ICU and during the follow ups, after the angioplasty was done. 
The wait time was always less than 15 min and the effort he took in explaining the condition and gradually reducing or altering the medication as needed  made me elated.
He knows his patients well that even in wee hours  he  could respond in WhatsApp for emergency situations. 
I highly recommend Dr. Naveen Chandra to be consulted for Cardiac diseases and angiography, angioplasty stunt placement related treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Recently had life threatening experience of sudden cardiac arrest while undergoing regular health checkup, thanks to some super power that made Dr Naveen Chandra to be at the spot and provide the first aid of CPR, which revived me from could-be fatal incident. Dr was able to identify the issue after taking me through angiogram and suggested with pacemaker implantation.Literally he is a lifesaver for meThank you very much Dr Naveen Chandra for kind guidance and proper followup of health condition.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr. Naveen Chandra is a doctor with a perfect combination of knowledge with compassion. We have been consulting him for the whole of 2022 for both my parents who suffered massive heart attacks . His treatment involves right judgement of the situation and tonnes of patience and compassion. This is what makes him one of the best doctors.He takes responsibility of his patients enough to be easily available and accessible to the patient and the patients family. It was because of this that we could manoeuvre through the year 2022 with ease. We could ask and clarify all our doubts however small they were and he always understood the situation we were in and answered them patiently and with clarity. I would highly recommend Dr. Naveen Chandra.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Carotid Angioplasty And Stenting,Cardiac checkup - General,Heart Conditions,
review:
********* ******* ** *** ** *** ****** ****** * ** **** ****** - personable, great listener and empathetic to the concerns of his patients. Had been to him when my mother had a heart attack. He was very prompt in his diagnosis and treatments. Best thing is that he is always available for any emergencies, easily approachable, responds in whichever way and whenever we contact him, available in video calls too if needed and avoids unneccessary expensive tests n treatments.....what more can a patient or a patient's kin want😊
Highly recommend for your Cardiovascular health.

Thankyou Doctor for being YOU!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have admitted for emergency at Columbia asia hospital Whitefield on 14th July 2021 for chest pain, immediately they have done MRI/Angiogram and Dr Naveeen has mentioned blockage in coronary artery valve, immediately has to go  for angioplasty and we have agreed and doctor has proceed with the procedure immediately. After 45 mins I got relief from pain.I am doing fine from last 1.5 years and very satisfied with Dr.Naveen chandra's treatment and suggestions on regular consultations. 


Jagadeesh

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mother had an acute AF with irregular heart rates. We were suggested by Dr. Naveen to be admitted in the hospital to stabilise this. And that very night, she has massive AF attack. Though Dr. Naveen wasn’t on night duty, but didn’t hesitate to answer my call at 2am and suggested ICU for mom. She was extremely critical and Dr. Naveen suggested Ventilators would help. He along with the ICU doctors saved Mom’s life. And, all of the treatments was suggested to us and never forced upon. His concern, always available on WhatsApp and calls and his line of treatment is what we all seek from a Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
My Father was admitted to Manipal Hospital for lv dysfunction,  Dr. Naveen Chandra explained in detailed about the complication and procedure they are following, very professional and giving enough time to  our queries.  Also explained in detail about the next options available and suggested for the ICD implantation. Based on his suggestion we have undergone ICD implantation which was done without any complications . Also post procedure he was very approachable and help us in all our queries. 
I would highly recommend him , for his professional commitment and most importantly for his approachability which made me stress free during the  hospitalization and post hospitalization also .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am a surgeon myself for over 45 years and as they say doctors don't make the best patients. Dr. Naveen Chandra has been the professional's professional. He has put my mind at ease from the start - gave me detailed options and made me comfortable with the procedure. He's very responsive to my queries and he has himself followed up multiple times. The procedure itself is done stressfree and I would travel to only see Dr. Naveen Chandra going forward. I highly recommend him for all things interventional cardiology.

tags: Wait time,
review: I was referred to  Dr Naveen as i was facing shortness of breath and severe lv dysfunction. Doctor had done a thorough investigation on the first visit and provided me emergency care for the symptoms. He was able to identify the condition and started with medical management. Post that, I have undergone an icd implantation procedure which went really smooth.  I have been in constant touch with the doctor and he's always accessible. He is very much open to our doubts and concerns and would clear them very patiently.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have a wonderful experience with Dr Naveen Chandra G S, he always helpful and friendly. My mother has been under his treatment and regular checkup since 3-4 years, Dr Naveen is very understanding and listen our concerns very carefully. Many thanks to Doctor for being such a caring doctor since our initial interaction.

Dear Dr Naveen,
Thank you so much for your excellent support last year when my mother had a heart stroke and you were personally looked into and ensured a quick recovery. 
Highly appreciated for your expert care, experience and quick diagnosis.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Naveen Chandra is one of the few doctors I have come across who has a fantastic combination of sharp medical accumen and a very humane touch. He treated both my parents for age and other disease related heart conditions. He had a very holistic way to treat the issues, and not just put load of medicines for the sake of it. He listened to us very patiently and answered each and every question. In the ICU situations he took decisions which were medically just right and more importantly keeping the patients needs in mind. I would highly recommend Dr Chandra to anyone who is looking for that perfect combination of a doctor who is very good in his medical approach with great human quality.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have immense gratitude towards Dr. Naveen Chandra for treating my father from an extremely critical condition when he had a heart failure to a point now of complete recovery. He is very patient and spent a great amount of time explaining the possible treatment course. When my father had to be in ICU and later in ward, Dr. Naveen would ensure regular monitoring and discussing treatment course. We had almost given up hope but my father's condition was revived and it still feels like a miracle for us through Dr. Naveen Chandra's hands. He has been a savior for us and we are indebted to him forever.

My mother is under Dr Naveen's care since last three years. Being a diabetic patient compounded with high BP issues calls for extra care and effective medical management. One incident worth mentioning is when she was having difficulty in breathing I took her to hospital. Dr Naveen immediately relaized the seriousness of issue and advised us to get her admitted and shifted to ICU. She had an attack of arrythmia later that day fortunately she was saved and we owe her life to doctor Naveen and staff. He responds to messages and calls even outside working hours. He is easy to talk with and answers your questions patiently. Under his treatment she is doing well now with normal BP and sugar levels.
Gave accurate advise, did not over prescribe treatment. A balanced and dependable doc for long term treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
I have been gone through massive Cardiac arrest last year and Dr. Naveen chandra has operated me successfully and within 4 days I was discharged from hospital.
Since then I am getting consultation from Dr. Naveen and it’s very satisfactory as he explain the health conditions in layman terms which help patient know about their body condition.
He even provide advise through call/messages if I have any query and can’t visit hospital.
Overall , I will definitely recommend Dr. Naveen for the service I am receiving till now.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I came on an emergency to Manipal hospital (then Columbia Asia) in the midnight during peak covid times in 2020. The hospital reached Dr.Naveen around 2AM and he immediately attended me and suggested for the right procedure as there was a 100% blockage in a major artery. Post the procedure he explained to us in detail very patiently and cleared all our doubts which gave me confidence. Since I come from a medical family background we took multiple suggestions from various Cardiologists in other cities. All the doctors whom we referred have said Dr. Naveen Chandra has done the right procedure at the right time which has saved me. He has prescribed the **** ** medicines till now which all the doctors have appreciated.
My family and me are very grateful to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,

My parents and family have had and continue to have a wonderful experience as patients of doctor Naveen Chandra . 



Dr Chandra’s High competence, diagnostics, compassion  and genuine love for his profession clubbed with high ethical standards have succeeded in helping my mother get a quality life against all odds. Dr. Chandra’s efforts to describe the diagnostics and treatment is second to none. As a family we trust Dr Chandra wholeheartedly and would highly recommend  him to everyone who is looking for a highly competent cardiologist in Bangalore. I sincerely thank Manipal Hospital for having great doctors like Dr Naveen Chandra in their panel . Our trust  and hopes continue to live because of such great doctors .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We first had a video call with Dr Naveen regarding my mother’s symptoms. He explained us the issue in detail. We went ahead with pacemaker implant and doctor was very friendly and as my mother said she didn’t realised when the surgery happened as they were mostly talking. During her one night ICU stay in the hospital, Dr Naveen was always communicating with us and he also did FaceTime with us when he was visiting my mothers in the ICU. We had the best experience with him and would highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Navinchandra is *** ** *** **** ************** accessible and approachable doc I have met and interacted with. He is treating my father who is 84 years old for pacemaker implant. He has been very patient with the numerous questions, doubts and also in explaining the process and procedure. During this COVID times, doc has been very sensitive and has called my father to the hospital only if required and has supported us as much as possible. 
In short, he goes the extra mile effortlessly for his patient and their family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been visiting Dr Naveen Chandra for my heart related ailments since past 6 months. initially there were irregularities in my heart beat. After conducting multiple  ECG and Holter tests and having discussions with him we arrived at the conclusion that a pace maker implant was a must. He is very friendly and explains the process in detail and with utmost patience. He is very dedicated and a nice human being. I thank him for conducting the angiogram and pace maker implant procedures successfully  , thanks to him I am doing well now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
He was so experienced that he could study my father's 20 years cardio history in minutes. He continued on same diagnostics and connected the new treatment after doing new Angiogram. Surprisingly he did al these in parallel while our actual appointment was for a different surgery and we contacted him just for risk assessment!

Never thought I could find a new cardio for my father when he moved in to city to live with me. Doctor spent good amount of time over phone and in real to understand surgery associated risks. He also co-ordinated with other specialists like oncologist, ENT and anestheisia specialist quickly. He was even in sync with the nursing station and labs and all reports! As a bonus he even knew the prominent oncologist who was my fathers previous doctor from Mangalore. I have not seen a doctor like this. All I say is Thanks!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Last year in March,  we had a serious complications with my mother, she was brought to hospital in very serious condition  being her breathlessness and also most she went directly into ventilator, the Dr. Present of mind and his approach towards handling the situation brought my mom back to life and she did a angiography and angioplasty post she recovered. I can only tell he was the savior at that given time and he is a friendly doctor with good reputation with trusted patients coming to him at Colombia Asia hospital. Thank you Doctor for very thing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:

A complete authority of his expertise area and a through professional, Dr. Naveen helped us with my Mom’s complicated angioplasty. She has recovered very well without any concerns.

In our regular intersections in the past 18 months , we have become so comfortable with Dr. Naveen that he has become our local family doctor and we think of him first incase any of our family members need any medical guidance.

Dr. Naveen, your work ethic is outstanding and that has earned genuine trust. 

Thank you for all your help.

There are no words that can possibly express the extent of our gratitude for the exceptional care and kindness you have shown us, travelling hours round trip to each appointment was worth every single minute/mile because I know there could be no better care than you did sir. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Little more than a year ago, we found out through routine tests that my dad needed an urgent surgery to remove blockages near his heart when we came to know about Dr Naveen. Given the urgent nature of issue, my dad was immediately admitted and Dr Naveen started working on his treatment and surgery. 

Looking back, we couldn't have hoped for better outcome to my dad health and my family cannot thank Dr Naveen enough. Not only did Dr Naveen perform surgery well, he did it by mentally preparing my dad that gave him confidence to go in surgery room and more importantly kept open communication with my entire family and updated us at each and every step of the process, explained pros/cons of different procedures that helped us make informed decisions as family member of patient. 

Writing this review a year later and we are still in touch with Dr and get our queries, questions answered.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have consulted Dr Naveen Chandra when my father got the heart attack. Doctor responded immediately and explained the condition of my father which was critical and chances of getting another stroke with 90% block in a artery. Doctor suggested to go for immediate Angioplasty. Dr Naveen Chandra has done a great job in performing the surgery on time and explained in detail about my father’s condition. Even after surgery the regular follow-ups and monitoring my father’s recovery was highly appreciated. He also induced a great confidence pre and post surgery to my father. I would highly recommend Dr Naveen Chandra for any Cardio related Surgeries with the way he handled my fathers case.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Meeting Dr Naveen was a chance encounter, as my mom was wheeled into the cardiac icu in a very critical state of going through a silent heart attack. The doctor responded quickly. He explained the basics of the treatment - which was an angioplasty with stents. In an hour or so, after the procedure, we met mom and doctor - both with a very reassuring smile. Later, doctor patiently explained to us in detail about her condition and the procedure done. It has been a year now that my mom has been visiting him regularly. Every session, with doctor willing to lend her an ear for all her queries and making changes in her medication to bring her back to normalcy and  comfort. Thank you doctor for your patience, professionalism and most of all the confidence instilled in her to come back to you anytime in need

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: we went to hospital for my uncle with symptoms related to chest pain. ECG report shows the sign of blocks. Immediately taken him into Cathlab for angiogram. it shows  blocks in both left and right arteries. Done Angioplast for one block which is about 90% and placed a stent.   Two days in ICU and  shifted to room. Done the Angiogram for the second block after one month of discharge. Doctor is friendly. He will listen to all your complaints patiently.  He clearly explained the problems. He prescribed only the relavant tests and medicines.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
We consulted Dr. Naveen for my mother. 
She is 74 years old and had issue of breathlessness, hypertension, chest pain, swollen in face and legs.
When we meet him first time, he listened to us very patiently  and understood the issue. He advised us for angiography. 
While doing angiography he found that there is an issue with Kidney and advised for Angioplasty of Kidney. We were bit worried because of the age and recovery chances. He also connected us with NEPHROLOGIST and clarified all our doubts and successfully operated her. With Dr. Naveen’s great work and God’s grace my mother is keeping  well. 
I have no hesitation in saying that he is a gem of person and excellent cardiologist.  During the course of treatment and after that I found him very much approachable. 
Would like to thank him from bottom of my heart for his support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Naveen Chandra is very skilled person in Cardiologist & other related areas. I am just 37yrs old female diagnosed with Blood clots in leg ang lungs. It is informed as Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT) and Pulmonary embolism (PE). Also i was suffering with fibroid disease with heavy bleeding on menstrual timings. Dr Naveen had took the right approach for treating me immediately. He started the right blood thinners to cure my DVT & PE. Normally blood thinners will worsen the fibroid bleedings almost double but no other choice for me to save from blood clots at that time. Dr Naveen had contacted & collaborated well with gynecologist doctors team and fixed my fibroid bleeding issue as well in very constructive way. He is very open and full supportive person in difficult timings.i am very much thankful to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Though my ECG, echo and treadmill didn’t show up anomalies…Doc felt the symptoms( increased time to normalise after exercise) didn’t match.. as we discussed if I should do a CT… He decided to do another ECG .. which showed up the start of an attack… was rolled in to the lab.. there were two blockages of 95 and 85 percent in LAD and RCA.. .discussed with Doc, as I lay on bed and got both stents… I was out of the lab in less than 30 minutes….

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Naveen Chandra was very professional, he explains patiently in layman's language. Mother had abnormal heart beat issues from many years.   She was actually taking wrong medication all these years for the problems she never had. He did EP study and found the issue. After Naveen Chandra identifying the issue it was treated and from the past 10 odd months she is perfectly fine and stopped the medication completely.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

Doctor helped us understand the situation holistically with all possible options and suggest best option. Highly appreciate and thankful to Doctor for all his excellent support and consultation help.
